Activity: Arrive at the office, log in to the system, and check emails. Respond to any urgent requests.
Review Monday's progress and adjust the task list for Tuesday.
Email @3dmod-1 and @3dmod-2 (3D Modelers) to schedule a meeting to discuss the art asset pipeline and identify opportunities for tool-assisted asset management, import, and optimization.
Email @tart-1 (Technical Artist) to schedule a meeting to discuss shader creation workflow and identify tools that could assist in shader development, debugging, and performance analysis.

Meeting with @3dmod-1 and @3dmod-2 (3D Modelers) to discuss art asset workflow, including modeling, texturing, and animation. Focus on potential tools for simplifying the import process, automating LOD generation, or previewing assets in-engine.
Meeting with @tart-1 (Technical Artist) to discuss the shader creation process, including visual shader graph tools, automated shader compilation, and in-engine shader debugging tools.
Lunch Break - Catch up on industry news related to game development tools and techniques.

Analyze the feedback from @3dmod-1, @3dmod-2 and @tart-1. Update the requirements and specifications for the tools based on their input. Focus on the 3D modelers' need to quickly integrate and test assets inside of the game.
Continue prototyping the level building tool. Implement the basic UI elements and functionality for placing and manipulating objects in the scene.
Research potential solutions for automating asset import and optimization. Investigate existing plugins and scripts that could be integrated into the tool.
Begin integrating the asset import functionality into the level building tool prototype.
End of Day - Review progress, update task list, and plan for Wednesday.
